info.name: Fight Club
info.actors: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Helena Bonham Carter
info.cast: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Helena Bonham Carter, Meat Loaf
info.description: A ticking-time-bomb insomniac and a slippery soap salesman channel primal male aggression into a shocking new form of therapy.
info.plot: A ticking-time-bomb insomniac and a slippery soap salesman channel primal male aggression into a shocking new form of therapy. Their concept catches on, with underground "fight clubs" forming in every town, until an eccentric gets in the way and ignites an out-of-control spiral toward oblivion.

video.codec_long_name: H.264 / AVC / MPEG-4 AVC / MPEG-4 part 10
